alert.note: Alert for Fremont County Including Canon City, Howard, Texas Creek; Huerfano County Including Walsenburg; Pueblo County Including Pueblo (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Red Flag Warning issued November 23 at 3:59AM MST until November 23 at 6:00PM MST by NWS Pueblo
info.description: ...A Red Flag Warning is in effect for portions of the area from 11 AM through 6 PM Wednesday... ...RED FLAG WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 11 AM THIS MORNING TO 6 PM MST THIS EVENING FOR GUSTY WINDS AND LOW RELATIVE HUMIDITY FOR FIRE WEATHER ZONES 222, 228, AND 229... * Affected Area...Fire Weather Zones 222, 228 and 229. * Winds...Northwest 10 to 20 mph with gusts up to 30 mph. * Relative Humidity...As low as 11 percent.
info.instruction: A Red Flag Warning means that critical fire weather conditions are either occurring now, or will shortly. A combination of strong winds, low relative humidity, and warm temperatures can contribute to extreme fire behavior.

area.areaDesc: Fremont County Including Canon City, Howard, Texas Creek; Huerfano County Including Walsenburg; Pueblo County Including Pueblo
